name: Starfarer (shellrider, JoeStrout)
description: The current version of our space trading game. The game is still in early development. If you are interested please go to https://forums.miniscript.org and read up on the devlogs. If you want to contribute please contact us. Join the discord https://discord.com/invite/7s6zajx or check out the code at https://github.com/shellrider-games/Starfarer.
